Articles.Content:
I\'m not attacking Nova, and he doesn\'t need lawyers anyway.

That part just has a bug: I checked the CFG, its specific impulse is 50 times less than the normal thruster quads. He just deleted some zeros by accident, probably.

I\'m not attacking Nova, and he doesn\'t need lawyers anyway.

That part just has a bug: I checked the CFG, its specific impulse is 50 times less than the normal thruster quads. He just deleted some zeros by accident, probably.

Yeah, in all likelihood. I\'ll decrease the fuel consumption, and thrust a little bit. Even out the ISP, make it not as powerful too.

Yeah, in all likelihood. I\'ll decrease the fuel consumption, and thrust a little bit. Even out the ISP, make it not as powerful too.

RCS is hard to get right for you. First its OP, then it doesn\'t work, and then it burns out too fast.
hey is there a reason engine Fairing panels wont align properly?, they all face one direction and wont cover but 1/4th of the ship
Use 4x symmetry.
Nova can you make stackable RCS block and ASAS that is palcing between comand pod and parachute

Use 4x symmetry.

i did..it doesnt seem to work either..only attaches one

Just wanted to share this.

It\'s awesome how getting to Mun gets easier and easier. Just did that new rocket and I was there taking photos in half an hour.

It\'s also awesome how well the fuel tank adapters fitted as a lander part. 8)

i did..it doesnt seem to work either..only attaches one

That\'s odd. Are you using the adapter plate?

Very small issue, dunno if it\'s present in others, but I notice the Mk. I command pod could use a bit more buoyancy; on splashdown only the parachute module is actually above the surface. Or maybe it\'s just wonderful minimalist Kerbal engineering in action? ;P

Edit: Nevermind. Seems this is just how it\'s supposed to be.

That\'s odd. Are you using the adapter plate?

yeah tried both, and nothing...just attaches to one side and stops, only the 2m curve cone seems work and not very well at that
Nova hout you make a 1.75 meter version of that quad decoupler compatable with kingtramp\'s Saturn V
hell. Why doesn\'t nova just make a saturn V shaped thing but in his paint scheme? i would like that more.

hell. Why doesn\'t nova just make a saturn V shaped thing but in his paint scheme? i would like that more.

Because he\'s gone...well - I hope not anyway, maybe just for a while.

From what I can gather, he\'s gone at least until persistence is added (so next update), maybe for even longer. But I must remind you that he was DRIVEN off.

But for now, from what I know, he migrated to Orbiter.
ROIGHT THEN
You bloody well roight!

ROIGHT THEN

You\'re back!
Hey Nova, where\'d you go?

Hey Nova, where\'d you go?

He got mad.

And left for a while.

:s

He got mad.

And left for a while.

:s

Expect me to be a lot less active here, just an FYI. I\'m pretty much done being involved in the affairs of anything but my own work.

Expect me to be a lot less active here, just an FYI. I\'m pretty much done being involved in the affairs of anything but my own work.

Eh, okay.

It\'s good to see you back posting, though.
well that dosent impact my life, I knew he would leave for good

well that dosent impact my life, I knew he would leave for good

What? Sorry, I can\'t understand your sentences do to the extremely low amount of effort you put into them.
Caesar, If you don\'t have anything nice to say. I suggest you keep it to yourself. Please, do not derail another thread.
